entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 12:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
